data.title: Command Hub Kanban Redeploy
data.objective: Redeploy and visually verify the Command Hub Tasks view with the correct Kanban logic, OASIS-aligned statuses, and real timestamps. Remove the old 'Catalog' column and enforce Scheduled / In Progress / Completed with ONE VTID = ONE CARD.

metadata.notes: Prior task 0050 ended at governance compliance without visible UI change. 0052 requires actual index.html patch, Cloud Run deployment, and visual verification at /command-hub.
